{"id_":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_4","metadata":{"page_number":4,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"Decide: local development or github codespace
● If you do it locally, you will need to have several packages installed (node,
etc) and then load the app to a github repo.
● If you do it in github codespaces, you will use the terminal there, the
necessary packages will be pre-installed already, the github repo will be
created automatically and the Vercel deployment will be fast and easy.
○ This is our recommendation.
© 2023 Julio Colomer, AI Accelera","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"DOCUMENT","hash":"h4XiN1Ottjd9GTREbC9wxoU+jWgyEwyzRtfRyrusuPc="}

{"id_":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_6","metadata":{"page_number":6,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"Enter this commands in the codespace terminal
● npx create-llama@latest
○ downloads the package
● enter the name of the app
● select template to use:
○ chat without streaming
○ chat with streaming (default)
● select the framework to use:
○ NextJS (default: for Vercel)
○ Express
○ FastAPI
● select (the chat) UI
○ just html (default)
○ shadcn
● select the chat engine:
○ SimpleChatEngine (default)
○ ContextChatEngine: for RAG
● provide OpenAI API key
○ include .env in .gitignore later
● select if you like to use ESLint
© 2023 Julio Colomer, AI Accelera","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"DOCUMENT","hash":"CboKvXCoM2NkzGvk9ugIMgoP5yFXsazAwDI/ce78tlE="}

{"id_":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_7","metadata":{"page_number":7,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"Upload your RAG private documents to /data
● Remove the sample file in my-app/data
● Upload your private documents in my-app/data
● cd my-ap
● npm run generate
● It splits your private documents in chunks and convert them in embeddings
using OpenAIEmbedding
© 2023 Julio Colomer, AI Accelera","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"DOCUMENT","hash":"9FJp+nRv7gkguRW4Bt72dXuTawrhYDZxNPOTfCEaVzA="}

{"id_":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_10","metadata":{"page_number":10,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"Load changes in github repo

{"id_":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_11","metadata":{"page_number":11,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"Deploy to Vercel
● Go to vercel.com
● Sign up with Github
● Give access to import the app's github repo
● Import the repo into Vercel
● Root directory: click edit and select the my-app folder
● Environment variables: enter the OpenAI API Key
● Click on the deploy button
● It will take some time to complete the deployment
● If you click on the app screen, it will open the app on Vercel
● Confirm the app works OK
● Check the Vercel dashboard
● Now in the page of the github repo there is a link to the app on Vercel
● If you want to delete the project from Vercel: dashboard>settings>delete project
© 2023 Julio Colomer, AI Accelera","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"DOCUMENT","hash":"Usb9DCzIYl+AiArvgU7+GWU/C+Bp4cG67hwvg+zB/f8="}

{"id_":"11107354-2e6b-430a-b09a-52182bca95e5","metadata":{"page_number":11,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"./data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf_11","metadata":{"page_number":11,"total_pages":11,"file_path":"/workspaces/FirstApp-Vercel/myapp-01/data/123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","file_name":"123BENG-LLAMAINDEX+WITH+VERCEL.pdf","private":"false"},"hash":"Usb9DCzIYl+AiArvgU7+GWU/C+Bp4cG67hwvg+zB/f8="}},"text":"Deploy to Vercel
● Go to vercel.com
● Sign up with Github
● Give access to import the app's github repo
● Import the repo into Vercel
● Root directory: click edit and select the my-app folder
● Environment variables: enter the OpenAI API Key
● Click on the deploy button
● It will take some time to complete the deployment
● If you click on the app screen, it will open the app on Vercel
● Confirm the app works OK
● Check the Vercel dashboard
● Now in the page of the github repo there is a link to the app on Vercel
● If you want to delete the project from Vercel: dashboard>settings>delete project
